channel.title: Migrations :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Umzug Now that we have a database configured in our application, we need to create some way to actually populate that database with the tables and information our app requires. We could obviously do that manually, but that really makes it difficult (if not impossible) to automatically build, test, and deploy this application. Thankfully, most database libraries also have a way to automate building the database structure. This is known as schema migration or often just migration.
